channel.title: Hosting a Project Insanity server on Linux Ubuntu? HELP [ 25$ AWARD ]
channel.description:
Hey, I have a big problem. I have installed Java on my VPS, and my run.sh looks like this;
java -Xmx1024 -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar server.Server
So here's how I do; 1. Open terminal 2. CD into the servers directory: (Currently Desktop/Server) 3. Type this command ./run.sh Then I get an error, "Exception in thread "main java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/Server" and it says a bunch of crap after that, if you need to see it all I will post it. How can I fix this? My msn is: m.ikael@hotmail.com You may teamview.

item.title: Hosting a Project Insanity server on Linux Ubuntu? HELP [ 25$ AWARD ]
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

Idk how to do shit on ubuntu but i do know that you need jdk and set your environment variables. Sorry i can’t help you much.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting a Project Insanity server on Linux Ubuntu? HELP [ 25$ AWARD ]
item.dc:creator: @Bossmous Bossmous
item.description:
@Bossmous wrote:

Hey, I have a big problem. I have installed Java on my VPS, and my run.sh looks like this;

java -Xmx1024 -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar server.Server

So here’s how I do;

  1. Open terminal
  2. CD into the servers directory: (Currently Desktop/Server)
  3. Type this command ./run.sh
    Then I get an error, "Exception in thread “main java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/Server”
    and it says a bunch of crap after that, if you need to see it all I will post it.

How can I fix this?
My msn is: m.ikael@hotmail.com

You may teamview.
